Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near  Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont,  due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Northbound Reroute near Austin/George
ShortDescription: Northbound 91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Diversey, Narragansett, Belmont and Austin: due to, street blockage  near Austin/George.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted via Austin, Diversey, Narragansett, Belmont and Austin: due to, street blockage  near Austin/George.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
